Definition: A model for representing medication usage.

Short: The business identifier(s) for the medication Usage
Definition: The business identifier(s) for the medication Usage

Short: What product this usage relates to
Definition: What product this usage relates to

Short: The date/time or interval when the product is/was/will be taken

Short: Source that provided the information about the usage of the product

Short: Reason for why the product is/was being taken

Short: Full representation of the dosage instructions
Definition: Full representation of the dosage instructions

Short: Details of how product is/was taken or should be taken

Short: Indicates if the product is being consumed or administered as instructed

Short: Details of the reason for the current adherence to the intended usage of the product
Definition: Details of the reason for the current adherence to the intended usage of the product

Short: Link to the 'parent' treatment - i.e the treatment that this order is derived from, or contriburing to
